nodes.text: The A-Z-Z-3 Light Freighter was a popular Mon Calamari transport in use during the Galactic Civil War.

24 meters in length and armed with two turreted laser cannons, the A-Z-Z-3 could carry eight passengers and 60 tons of cargo. Like most Mon Calamari designs, the A-Z-Z-3 included several backup systems including a backup shield generator.
The only known specifications for the A-Z-Z-3 are for the Black Obsession, which is identified as "modified."
